contentrichtext.text: {{About|the Austrian company|other uses|Blum (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox company | name = Julius Blum GmbH | logo = Blum-logo01-300.jpg | type = | genre = | foundation = 1952 | founder = | location = [[Höchst, Austria|Höchst]] | origins = | key_people = Herbert Blum <small>(Manager)</small><br/>Gerhard E. Blum <small>(Manager)</small> | area_served = | industry = Metal working | products = [[Builder's hardware|Cabinet hardware]] | services = | revenue = 1,166 Mrd. EUR (2009/2010) | operating_income = | net_income = | num_employees = 5,304 (2010/2011)<ref name="Annual accounts 2010/11">[http://www.blum.com/eu/en/04/02/releases/pre_1107_031.php press release] of Julius Blum GmbH from 12. Juli 2011 until end of business year 2010/11.</ref> | parent = | divisions = | subsid = | owner = | company_slogan =Perfecting motion | homepage = [http://www.blum.com] | dissolved = | footnotes = }} '''Julius Blum GmbH''' (commonly referred to as "blum") manufactures [[Hinge|concealed hinges]], [[Drawer (furniture)|drawer systems]],<ref name="BizJournals"/> and other related fittings for the [[Cabinetry|cabinet making]] and furniture industry, as well as machinery used by cabinet manufacturers. The company's slogan is "Perfecting motion". Their products are used in the [[frameless construction]] method of cabinet making. It is a family-owned company based in [[Höchst, Austria|Höchst]], [[Vorarlberg]] in [[Austria]].<ref name="BizJournals">[http://www.bizjournals.com/charlotte/stories/2008/04/14/daily10.html Blum spends $10M for equipment - Charlotte Business Journal<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> The company has 5,700 employees, as of June 30, 2012.<ref name=Blum>{{cite web | last = | first = | authorlink = | coauthors = | title =Daten und Fakten | work = | publisher =Julius Blum GmbH | year =2012 | url =http://www.blum.com/at/de/04/10/10/ | format = | doi = | accessdate =March 15, 2013 }}</ref> 96 percent of its products are exported, and its annual turnover is EUR 1,261,100,000.<ref name=Blum/> The company has production facilities in Austria, Brazil,<ref>{{cite news | last = | first = | coauthors = | title =Gaveta personalizada | newspaper =Portal Moveleiro | location =[[Florianópolis]] | pages = | language = | publisher = | date =September 4, 2009 | url =http://conteudo.portalmoveleiro.com.br/visualiza-noticia.php?cdNoticia=17902 | accessdate =March 15, 2013 }}</ref> Poland<ref>{{cite web | last = | first = | authorlink = | coauthors = | title =FURNITURE FITTINGS SPECIALIST AS A FORERUNNER BY THE APPLICATION OF SOLAR PROCESS HEAT | work = | publisher =Ritter XL Solar | year =2011 | url =http://www.ritter-xl-solar.com/en/references/industry-and-business/julius-blum-gmbh-aut/ | format = | doi = | accessdate =March 15, 2013 }}</ref> and the United States.<ref name="BizJournals"/> <center><gallery caption="Julius Blum GmbH" widths="220px" heights="220px" perrow="5"> File:Blum Werk 2 Höchst.jpg|Company Headquarter factory 2 [[Höchst, Austria|Höchst]] File:Blum Werk 7 Dornbirn .JPG|Company factory 7 in [[Dornbirn]] </gallery></center> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==Further reading== * {{de icon}} [http://wirtschaftsblatt.at/archiv/unternehmen/992390/index Unternehmen & Märkte « Archiv « wirtschaftsblatt.at<!-- Bot generated title -->] * {{de icon}} [http://derstandard.at/1246542141872/Beschlaegehersteller-Umsatzrueckgang-bei-Blum Umsatzrückgang bei Blum - Unternehmen - derStandard.at › Wirtschaft<!-- Bot generated title -->] * {{de icon}} [http://wirtschaftsblatt.at/home/nachrichten/oesterreich/1140050/index Österreich « Nachrichten « wirtschaftsblatt.at<!-- Bot generated title -->] * [http://nl.newsbank.com/nl-search/we/Archives?p_product=CO&s_site=charlotte&p_multi=CO&p_theme=realcities&p_action=search&p_maxdocs=200&p_topdoc=1&p_text_direct-0=0EB6D13056A95682&p_field_direct-0=document_id&p_perpage=10&p_sort=YMD_date:D&s_trackval=GooglePM Charlotte: Search Results<!-- Bot generated title -->]{{Paywall}} * [http://nl.newsbank.com/nl-search/we/Archives?p_product=SJ&s_site=mercurynews&p_multi=SJ&p_theme=realcities&p_action=search&p_maxdocs=200&p_topdoc=1&p_text_direct-0=0EB71F2FF16E1DC1&p_field_direct-0=document_id&p_perpage=10&p_sort=YMD_date:D&s_trackval=GooglePM Mercury News: Search Results<!-- Bot generated title -->]{{Paywall}} ==External links== {{commons category|Julius Blum (Unternehmen)}} *[http://www.blum.com Julius Blum GmbH] [[Category:Manufacturing companies of Austria]] {{Company-stub}} {{Industry-stub}}
